xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager
Class NextFitWithHStrategy

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager.AbstractStrategy
      xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager.NextFitWithHStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Strategy, Convertable
Direct Known Subclasses:
NextFitWithHWStrategy
public class NextFitWithHStrategy
extends AbstractStrategy

This class provides a next-fit strategy for the record manager. A histogram is used to store the number of pages in each bucket, thus saving one lookup in the index when the serach for a page with enough free space is unsuccesfull.

See Also:

Field Detail

lastEntry

protected Map.Entry lastEntry
Stores the last entry where a reservation has been made.

histogram

protected int[] histogram
Histogram held inside. 
 Example with 5 buckets: (percent of free space)
 bucket 0: [0.0,0.25)
 bucket 1: [0.25,0.5)
 bucket 2: [0.5,0.75)
 bucket 3: [0,75,1.0)
 bucket 4: [1.0,1.0]

numberOfBuckets

protected int numberOfBuckets
Number of buckets inside the histogram.

numberOfFullSearches

protected int numberOfFullSearches
Number of full searches which were necessary.

Determines the bucket, into which a page falls.

init

public void init(SortedMap pages,
                 int pageSize,
                 int maxObjectSize)
Description copied from class: AbstractStrategy
Initializes the strategy. This call must be made, before the first real (other) operation is performed. The call can also be made multiple times.

Specified by:
init in interface Strategy
Overrides:
init in class AbstractStrategy
Parameters:
pages - SortedMap with key pageId and value of type PageInformation.
pageSize - size of each page in bytes.
maxObjectSize - Size of the largest record which can be stored inside the RecordManager.
See Also:
Strategy.init(java.util.SortedMap, int, int)

addHistogramEntry

protected void addHistogramEntry(Object pageId,
                                 int bucketNumber)
Adds a new entry to the histogram. The entry has a given page identifyer.

Parameters:
pageId - Identifyer of the page, for which a histogram entry is added.
bucketNumber - Number of the bucket of the histogram where the entry is added.

removeHistogramEntry

protected void removeHistogramEntry(Object pageId,
                                    int bucketNumber)
Removes an entry from the histogram. The entry has a given page identifyer.

Parameters:
pageId - Identifyer of the page, for which the histogram entry is removed.
bucketNumber - Number of the bucket of the histogram where the entry is removed.

calculateHistogram

protected int[] calculateHistogram()
Recalculates the whole histogram from the pages and returns the array (does not overwrite the old histogram). The methods addHistogramEntry and removeHistogramEntry are not used here!

Returns:
The calculated histogram.

checkConsistency

protected void checkConsistency()
Checks the consistency of the current histogram with the real values. If the values does not match, then an Exception is thrown.

testEntry

public Map.Entry testEntry(Map.Entry entry,
                           int bytesRequired)
Tests an entry if there is enough space for a reservation.

Parameters:
entry - The entry to be tested.
bytesRequired - bytes needed for the Record.
Returns:
the entry if a reservation is possible else null.

consultHistogram

protected Map.Entry consultHistogram(int bytesRequired)
Consults the histogram and returns an entry which can hold the record. If there is an existing but unknown page where the record will fit the method will return null. If the method can say that there will be no such page, then a MapEntry with (null, null) is returned.

Parameters:
bytesRequired - Number of bytes required for the current record.
Returns:
A valid Map.Entry, null or MapEntry(null, null).

getPageForRecord

public Object getPageForRecord(int bytesRequired)
Finds a block with enough free space to hold the given number of bytes.

Specified by:
getPageForRecord in interface Strategy
Specified by:
getPageForRecord in class AbstractStrategy
Parameters:
bytesRequired - The free space needed, in bytes.
Returns:
Id of the Page or null, if no such page exists.

recordUpdated

public void recordUpdated(Object pageId,
                          RecordManager.PageInformation pi,
                          short recordNumber,
                          int recordsAdded,
                          int bytesAdded,
                          int linkRecordsAdded)
Description copied from class: AbstractStrategy
Informs the strategy, that the RecordManager has performed an update on a certain page. size==-1 means removal.

Specified by:
recordUpdated in interface Strategy
Overrides:
recordUpdated in class AbstractStrategy
Parameters:
pageId - identifyer of the page where an update has occured.
pi - PageInformation for the page.
recordNumber - number of the record which has been changed.
recordsAdded - number of records which were added.
bytesAdded - number of added bytes inside the Page (can be negative).
linkRecordsAdded - number of link records added.
See Also:
